hypothesis_content.title: ETF Flow Divergence Momentum
hypothesis_content.statement: When daily BTC ETF net flows turn positive after 3+ consecutive days of outflows during NEUTRAL regime, and price has declined or consolidated during outflow period, the first 90 minutes of US equity market open (14:30-16:00 UTC) will see accelerated buying producing >1.2% move as pent-up demand executes.
hypothesis_content.rationale: ETF flows represent institutional sentiment. Consecutive outflows create oversold conditions. Flow reversal signals sentiment shift. Current news mentions 'ETF outflows, holiday lull' - when flows reverse post-holiday, pent-up demand executes at market open. Market makers adjust inventory accordingly.
entry_conditions: 3+ consecutive days of BTC ETF net outflows (per published data)
Day 4 shows positive net inflow in pre-market reports
BTC price is within 2% of lowest close during outflow period
Entry at US market open (14:30 UTC) if first 5-minute candle is green
hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Positive flow reversal fails to produce momentum >0.5% in >50% of instances, or selling pressure continues despite flow reversal.
